item.title: Understanding iOS Jailbreaking - A Look at Various Jailbreak Types
item.description: Jailbreaking an iPhone refers to bypassing the restrictions and limitations set by Apple's iOS.

item.title: IPA (iOS AppStore Package)
item.description: iOS apps are distributed in IPA (iOS App Store Package) archives, which are ZIP-compressed files containing the app's binary, resources, and metadata needed to execute on iOS devices.

item.title: Acquiring IPA File
item.description: The IPA file is required for various areas of mobile app examination and security.

item.title: Unlocking iPhone - Guide to Jailbreaking iOS
item.description: The process for jailbreaking various iOS versions can be quite different.
